Class Ext.ux.ProgressBarPager

Package:Ext.ux
Defined In:ux-all-debug.js
Class:ProgressBarPager
Extends:Object
Plugin (ptype = 'tabclosemenu') for displaying a progressbar inside of a paging toolbar instead of plain text

A Ext.Fx configuration object. Default is { duration : 1, easing : 'bounceOut' }.
